div.p: This papyrus (PHerc. 1044) has been digitally edited by Christian Sailer and revised by Vincenzo Damiani as part of the Project Anagnosis and the Würzburger Zentrum für Epikureismusforschung
This papyrus (PHerc. 1715) has been digitally edited by Claudio Vergara (CISPE) and revised by Vincenzo Damiani as part of the Project Anagnosis and the Würzburger Zentrum für Epikureismusforschung
